name: Cabaretti Confluence

rulings.text: If you choose the first and third mode, the creature tokens will enter the battlefield before the creatures target player controls get +1/+1 and gain first strike. If you target yourself with the third mode, the tokens will get that bonus.

text:
Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
• Exile target artifact or enchantment.
• Creatures target player controls get +1/+1 and gain first strike until end of turn.
